Text.Name: ZhengYiA
Text.IVNUMBER.0.Animal.Tip: Inside it is a boar at the Awakening State. The training it received from the sect has granted it Formation related memories.

Text.Name: ZhengYiAL
Text.IVNUMBER.0.Animal.Tip: Inside it is a boar at the Awakening State, it possesses the Intelligence of Fear.
Text.IVNUMBER.1.Animal.Tip: Inside it is a boar at the Awakening State, it possesses the Intelligence of Thoughts.
Text.IVNUMBER.2.Animal.Tip: Inside it is a boar at the Awakening State, it possesses the Intelligence of Delight.
Text.IVNUMBER.3.Animal.Tip: Inside it is a boar at the Awakening State, it possesses the Intelligence of Rage.
Text.IVNUMBER.4.Animal.Tip: Inside it is a boar at the Awakening State, it possesses the Intelligence of Anxiety.
